idea-plugin.name: Rabbit SQL
idea-plugin.description:
Rabbit SQL Framework Support

Provides support for rabbit-sql to JetBrains IDEA.

Easily to use rabbit-sql and XQL file.

Features

  • Support the identification of xql(.xql) file type.
  • Support dynamic sql expression script live templates(e.g: xql:if).
  • Support intention action Execute Dynamic sql and Copy sql definition by sql name(e.g: &my.users).
  • Support quick look sql definition by sql name(e.g: &my.users).
  • Support generate mapper interface by registered xql file.
  • Support java and xql file references to navigate each other.
  • Support sql name suggestions auto complete in java string literal where start with "&".
  • Toolwindow:
    • Structured tree view.
    • Manage multiple xql-file-manager.yml.
    • Some more useful actions.
  • Toolbar menu:
    • File > New > Xql File | Xql File Manager
    • Tools > XQL File Manager

Getting Started

Create a new maven project.

Springboot

  1. Add dependency rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.11.6+ to your project;
  2. Create xql-file-manager.yml in resources root: .../src/main/resources/;
    ( Toolwindow > XQL File Manager > Module(Mouse Right click) > New )
  3. Register xql files on property: files;

Other

  1. Add dependency rabbit-sql 7.12.6+ to your project;
  2. Create xql-file-manager.yml in resources root: .../src/main/resources/;
    ( Toolwindow > XQL File Manager > Module(Mouse Right click) > New )
  3. Register xql files on property: files;
  4. Configure XQLFileManager;
  5. Configure BakiDao#setXqlFileManager;

Get Best Practice document or a Demo to quick start.

Get more information from Rabbit-sql homepage and Springboot support document.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
2.4.15

  • Interface Mapper Generator layout optimized.
  • Action: Select Opened File available in Mapper interface.
  • File icons optimized.
  • Fixed Interface Mapper Generator error caused by table dragging columns.
  • Fixed Execute Dynamic sql error when Database plugin not enabled.
  • Fixed Smart create/append xql action bug.

2.4.14

  • Add support for compatible with IDEA IC.
  • Add support kotlin/yaml/database plugin can be optional.
  • Add support Springboot project detect XQL mapper interface as bean if startup class with @XQLMapperScan.

2.4.13

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.12.6+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.11.6+
  • Interface Mapper generate optimized.
  • Add support method prefix get, list for generate Mapper interface detect to return List[T].)
  • Popup window size adjustment.
  • Some optimized.

2.4.12

  • Fixed New SQL action the delimiter always is ';' when xql-file-manager.yml delimiter is not ';'.
  • Generate Code... support deselect methods to generate.)
  • Interface Mapper doc generate optimized.
  • XQL file loading and parsing performance optimized.
  • Some codes optimized and bugs fixed.

2.4.11

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.12.2+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.11.2+
  • Fixed generate mapper interface error when xql alias contains '-' or '_'.
  • Generate mapper optimized.

2.4.10

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.12.0+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.11.0+
  • New Action Generate code support generate XQL Mapper interface.
  • Add support auto @CountQuery on method if method is page query for Generate code when xql file manager contains sql name which ends withs count, Count or -count.
  • Add support xql reference for XQL Mapper interface method.
  • Add Basic support for kotlin.
  • Update xql file template.
  • Remove SQL Language injection on baki.
  • Compatible with IDEA IU 2024.3.* .
  • Some optimized.

2.4.9

  • Dynamic Sql script highlight optimized.

2.4.8

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.11.8+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.12+
  • Fixed dynamic sql #for-#done bug.

2.4.7

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.11.7+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.11+
  • Fixed XQL File Manager parsing block annotation bug.

2.4.6

  • Support rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.10+
  • XQL File Manager toolwindow change to load all configs.
  • Fixed XQL File Manager toolwindow Speed Search cannot expand bug.

2.4.5

  • Support rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.9+
  • Some optimized.

2.4.4

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.11.6+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.8+
  • Sql highlight optimized.
  • Some optimized.

2.4.3

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.11.4+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.6+
  • Parameter dialog input font optimized.
  • Some optimized.

2.4.2

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.11.3+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.5+
  • Dynamic sql #for-#done removed named parameter prefix _for..
  • Dynamic sql #for-#done loop sql body named parameter parsing optimized.
  • Fixed dynamic sql #for-#done missing pipes verify bug.
  • Fixed dynamic sql execute dialog parameter parsing bugs.
  • Some optimized and bugs fixed.

2.4.1

  • Dynamic sql script syntax error message show details.
  • XQL File Manager toolwindow xql file node support action Copy to copy file to clipboard.
  • XQL File Manager toolwindow sql fragment node support press SPACE to preview sql content.
  • New Action: XQL File Manager Toolwindow Select Opened File takes effect in xql file and java string literal sql reference.
  • Update xql tree icons.
  • Fixed active another config not trigger file refresh.
  • Some optimized and bug fixed.

2.4.0

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.11.1+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.10.3+
  • Support Dynamic sql script syntax verify when XQL File Manager reload.
  • Support verify invalid nested dynamic sql script.
  • Support switch-case and choose-when branch nest switch and choose expression.
  • Dynamic Sql flow-control syntax verify optimized.
  • Fixed dynamic sql parsed result concat bugs.
  • Fixed dynamic sql parsed bugs.
  • Some optimized and bugs fixed.

2.3.3

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.9.18+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.9.17+
  • Dynamic sql parser optimized.
  • Dynamic sql parse support #if-#else-#fi block.
  • Dynamic sql #case branch support multiple values: e.g. #case 'a', 3.14, c .
  • More strict syntax check for dynamic sql script.
  • Xql live templates updated.
  • Compatible with IDEA IU 242.18071.24 .
  • Some optimized.

2.3.2

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.9.13+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.9.12+
  • Add supports for xql file protocol: file://, http(s)://, ftp://
  • Add supports for yml config variable placeholder: ${env.Name} (System.getenv()) e.g. http://server/home.xql?token=${env.TOKEN}
  • Dynamic sql test parameter input support expandable.
  • Fixed named parameter in annotation occurs error.

2.3.1

  • Support rabbit-sql 7.9.8+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.9.7+
  • Sql quick doc support highlight named parameter.
  • Some optimized.

2.3.0

  • Compatible with IDEA IU 2024.2.* .
  • Toolwindow: XQL File Manager add support speed search sql statement and description.
  • Toolwindow: XQL File Manager add support action for toggle xql display view mode(tree and flat)
  • Support rabbit-sql 7.9.4+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.9.3+
  • Notification shown optimized.
  • Fixed Toolwindow XQL File Manager tree node mouse right button click empty location cannot trigger menu popup.
  • Some optimized.

2.2.11

  • Dialog: New XQL File support write description.
  • Toolwindow: XQL File Manager xql file tree node support show description if exists.
  • Toolwindow: XQL File Manager xql file tree node add action 'Copy Path/Reference...'
  • Toolwindow: XQL File Manager make xql file tree node ordered following the config's files property.
  • Add Statistics action to Tools > XQL File Manager
  • Support rabbit-sql 7.9.3+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.9.2+
  • Fixed founded xql-file-manager.yml in test resources bug.
  • Some optimized.

2.2.10

  • Statistics table support action Add XQLFileManager config if config not exists.
  • Statistics file size display text optimized.
  • Execute dynamic sql dialog add new button for open database configuration dialog.
  • Fixed Statistics table header reordered lost click event.
  • Some optimized.

2.2.9

  • New Action: Statistics on XQL File Manager toolwindow.
  • Statistics Support copy displayed table data as tsv format content to Clipboard.
  • Intention Action: Execute dynamic sql text optimized.
  • Toolwindow icon optimized.
  • New SQL Dialog size optimized.

2.2.8

  • New action: New on XQL File Manager toolwindow xql file.
  • New Toolwindow icon.
  • Fixed Execute dynamic sql number parameter parse error.
  • Fixed Toolwindow XQL File Manager cannot show module bug when src/main/resources has other *.yml files.
  • Some more optimized.

2.2.7

  • New Action: New on XQL File Manager toolwindow project module.
  • XqlFileManager toolwindow support show module without config.
  • Fixed xql reference name navigate bug.
  • Some more optimized.

2.2.6

  • Sql reference name suggestions support show description if exists.

2.2.5

  • Update icons.
  • Sql name reference in java quick doc style optimized for IDEA IU 2024.1.*
  • New intention action: Copy sql definition available in xql file sql name.
  • New intention action: Copy sql parameters to key-value pairs available in java sql name reference.
  • Fixed xql tree tooltip bug.
  • Some more optimized.

2.2.4

  • Support rabbit sql 7.8.26+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.8.22+.
  • .xql file support description( /*#some description...#*/ ) for sql fragment which around sql name.
  • XQL File Manager ToolWindow support show sql fragment description if exists.
  • Sql reference quick doc add support for show sql fragment description.
  • XQL File Manager Config template update.
  • New live template xql:desc to generate /*##*/ .

2.2.3

  • Fixed dynamic sql parsing without fix sql syntax bug.
  • Support rabbit sql 7.8.24+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.8.20+.

2.2.2

  • Support rabbit sql 7.8.22+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.8.17+.

2.2.1

  • Support IDEA 241.*(2024.1.*).
  • Fixed dynamic sql parsing bug.
  • Fixed Execute dynamic sql and New Xql File text box cannot display Chinese characters.

2.2.0

  • Support rabbit sql 7.8.20+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.8.16+.
  • New Feature: XQL File Manager Toolwindow panel, supports display structured config, toggle multiple config, reload config, execute sql action, etc.
  • Toolwindow Action New support for open file after dialog closed.
  • Toolwindow support xql fragment double-click to navigate to xql file.
  • New Action: New (Toolwindow xql-file-manager.yml node mouse right click to create xql file and auto update config).
  • New Intention Action: Smart create/append xql...(If sql reference in xql not exists).
  • Add supports for multiple xql-file-manager-*.yml.
  • Add icon for intention action: Execute/Copy Dynamic Sql.
  • Improved xql-file-manager.yml parsing and loading logic.
  • Update sql name quick doc highlight sql.
  • Action Reload All(Reload Xql File Manager) scope range optimized.
  • Execute Dynamic sql dialog parameter title optimized.
  • Fixed plugin error occurs UnsupportedOperationException when popping dynamic sql dialog.
  • Fixed xql reference gutter icon in java file cannot navigate to xql file bug.
  • Fixed logging the not should be logged ControlFlowException error.
  • Fixed plugin error in .xql file syntax highlight bug.
  • Fixed create xql-file-manager.yml occurs error notice.
  • Fixed dynamic sql dialog parameter detect not correct.
  • Fixed Execute Dynamic sql parameter value is null occurs output empty string bug.
  • Fixed Execute Dynamic sql detect string template(${!key}) parameters bug.
  • Some bugs have been fixed and some optimizations made.

2.1.6

  • Support rabbit sql 7.8.6 and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.8.5.
  • Support IDEA 233.*(2023.3.*).
  • Live templates update.

2.1.5

  • Support rabbit sql 7.6.4 and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.6.5.
  • Dynamic sql Args support prefix: _parameter .

2.1.4

  • Support rabbit sql 7.6.1 and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.6.1.
  • Dynamic sql new pipe: kv .
  • Dynamic sql #for...#done: delimiter default append '\n'.
  • New Live Template: xql:example-update .

2.1.3

  • Sql language injection support rabbit-sql 7.5.7+.

2.1.2

  • Fixed Execute Dynamic sql "" or '' not equals blank.
  • Fixed Execute Dynamic sql error when create Jdbc console if already exists.
  • Execute Dynamic sql add remember selected and executed database.
  • rabbit sql updated to 7.5.5+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.5.6+.
  • Compatible with IDEA IU 2023.2
  • Some bugs fixed.

2.1.1

  • rabbit sql updated to 7.5.3+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.5.4+.
  • Cancel error highlight.
  • quick doc optimized.
  • Fixed dynamic sql compare number bug.
  • Fixed dynamic sql property chains find value bug.
  • Update plugin description.

2.1.0

  • rabbit-sql 7.5.2+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.5.3+ is required.
  • Dynamic sql remove #for...#end block, not support filter anymore.
  • Feature: Dynamic sql support #for...#done block.
  • xql:for-xxx live template update.

2.0.6

  • Execute Dynamic Sql dialog layout optimized.
  • Support rabbit-sql 7.4.0+ and rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter 2.5.0+.
  • Fixed some bugs.

2.0.5

  • Feature: xql-file-manager.yml support configure pipes property.
  • Feature: Menu Tools add action: Reload XQL File Manager

2.0.4

  • Fixed error: xql-file-manager.yml configure pipes property.

2.0.3

  • Update rabbit-sql version: support v7.2.6+.
  • `xql-file-manager.yml` remove properties: `highlight-sql`, `check-period`, `check-modified`.

2.0.2

  • XQL file line marker search scope optimized.
  • XQL file line marker info text optimized.
  • Listener of parse xql file optimized.
  • Add show notifications when xql updated.
  • Some optimized.

2.0.1

  • Support intention action [Execute Dynamic sql] in xql file's sql name which configured in xql-file-manager.yml.
  • Support show sql name error highlight if sql definition not exists.
  • Parameters dialog '_' as parameter default placeholder.
  • [Execute Dynamic sql]: Configured database cache fixed bugs when same name founded.
  • [Execute Dynamic sql]: Set Transaction Mode to Manual as default.
  • Fixed [CopySqlDefinition] automatic trigger when hover the menu item.
  • Some optimized.

2.0.0

  • Support IDEA IU 2022.2.5+
  • Some bugs fixed and updates.

1.14

  • Sql language injections support baki v7.1.20+
  • Execute Dynamic sql support execute dynamic sql by choose configured database.
  • Execute Dynamic sql support display query result.
  • Some bugs fixed and updates.

1.13

  • Support [Execute Dynamic sql] action at sql name.(e.g: &my.query)
  • Fixed plugin not working on trust a new project.
  • Some bugs fixed.

1.12

  • Optimized java and xql file update event.
  • Some bugs fixed.

1.11

  • Add support for xql-file-manager.yml
  • Add xql-file-manager.yml Chinese language config template menu item.
  • Remove support for xql-file-manager.properties
  • rabbit-sql version >= 7.1.12 is required.
  • rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter version >= 2.2.14 is required.
  • Update xql-file-manager.yml icon
  • Add icon for xql-file-manager[-.]*.yml format.
  • Fixed load xql-file-manager.yml error when property value is empty.

1.10

  • Quick doc support show template parameters.
  • Fixed xql file changed not trigger refreshing.
  • Update getting started doc.

1.9

  • Fixed sql name suggestion auto complete with case-insensitive.
  • Fixed plugin runtime error when build xql navigator and file is only in memory.
  • Fixed some other bugs and code optimized.

1.8

  • Fixed quick doc highlight sql show the wrong element.

1.7

  • Special icon for xql-file-manager.properties
  • Fixed xql file manager resource shared bugs in multiple opened projects.
  • Fixed open second or more projects occurs xql file manager init fired many times.

1.6

  • Sql name quick doc instead of tooltip.
  • Some bug fixed and code optimized.

1.5

  • For support all features, rabbit-sql version >= 7.1.0, rabbit-sql-spring-boot-starter version >= 2.2.0.
  • Add supports xql-file-manager.properties config file to create a relation for rabbit-sql and it's plugin.
  • Add file template see Toolbar menu: File | New | [Xql File | Xql File Manager Config]
  • Some bug fixed and code optimized.

1.4

  • sql name reference quick navigate.
  • Support sql name suggestions auto complete in java string literal where start with "&".
  • fixed XQLFileManager load error when duplicate sql name in same xql file.
  • some bug fixed and code optimized.

1.3

  • java and xql line markers supports navigate to location where sql name is now.

1.2

  • Support quick look sql definition by name(e.g: &my.users).
  • Baki interface Support inject SQL language(e.g: query("select ...")).
  • Support copy sql by sql name.(macOS: Option + Enter, Windows: Alt + Enter).

1.1

  • Support quick look sql definition when mouse over then sql name;
  • fixed sql name not matches occurs annotator error.

action.description: Statistics of XQL File Manager configs.
Commit all files and reload XQL File Manager.
Refresh XQL file manager tool window content.
